Uses of Class
org.wildfly.security.auth.realm.ldap.SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder

  • Packages that use SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.wildfly.security.auth.realm.ldap
    Classes related to a SecurityRealm implementation capable of integrating with LDAP servers.

    • Uses of SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder in org.wildfly.security.auth.realm.ldap

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder.builder()
      Construct a new instance.
      SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder.setAuthenticationContext(AuthenticationContext authenticationContext)
      Set the authentication context as source of security credential.

      Set additional connection properties.

      Set the timeout for connecting to the server.
      SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder.setCredentialSource(CredentialSource credentialSource)
      Set the authentication credential source.
      SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder.setInitialContextFactory(String initialContextFactory)
      Set the initial context factory class name.
      SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder.setModule(org.jboss.modules.Module module)
      Set module which will be used to load context factory and context.
      SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder.setProviderUrl(String providerUrl)
      Set the provider URL.
      SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder.setReadTimeout(int readTimeout)
      Set the read timeout for an LDAP operation.
      SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder.setSecurityAuthentication(String securityAuthentication)
      Set the security authentication method.
      SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder.setSecurityCredential(String securityCredential)
      Set the authentication credential.
      SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder.setSecurityPrincipal(String securityPrincipal)
      Set the authentication principal.
      SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder SimpleDirContextFactoryBuilder.setSocketFactory(SocketFactory socketFactory)
      Set the socket factory to be used by LDAP context.
